name: PsExec Service Execution
description: Detects launch of the PSEXESVC service, which means that this system was the target of a psexec remote execution
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\PSEXESVC.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:psexesvc.exe)`
